      • runQuery

        public static java.lang.String[] runQuery​(java.lang.Object[] input)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Queries the user's input. V = All unique words in lexicon. {D} = subset of words from all documents.
        Parameters:
        input - User's input
        Returns:
        String[] of the top ten documents that is most similar to the user's query
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Handles any IO errors while accessing the dict.raf file Time Complexity: O({D}V) Space Complexity: O({D}V)

      • idf

        public static float idf​(int totalDocs,
                        int count)
        Helper method to calculate Inverse Document Frequency
        Parameters:
        totalDocs - Total number of documents in directory
        count - Total occurrences of a specified word
        Returns:
        IDF value Time Complexity: O(1) Space Complexity: O(1)

      • calculateSimilarity

        public static java.lang.String calculateSimilarity​(float[] documentVector,
                                                   float[] inputVector,
                                                   int file)
        Revised calculateSimilarity method to be more fitted for the querying phase.
        Parameters:
        inputVector - User's input vector
        documentVector - Current document vector
        file - The file number to be sent back to the user
        Returns:
        Similarity score and document vector index Time Complexity: O(V) Space Complexity: O(dV)

      • calculateTermDocumentVector

        public static java.lang.String calculateTermDocumentVector​(int file,
                                                           java.lang.Object[] stringInputArr,
                                                           float[] queryVector,
                                                           int numDocs)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                                           java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Builds the term-document matrix in order to easily calculate similarity between the user's input vector and every document
        Parameters:
        file - File to be processed
        stringInputArr - Input array that user entered
        queryVector - Input vector calculated from user input
        numDocs - The number of documents in the training corpus
        Returns:
        The term-document matrix
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Handles any IO errors that may occur when accessing the .raf and trainingCorpus files Time Complexity: O(d) Space Complexity: O(V)
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Exception thrown in case there is any issues finding a document
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if there are issues reading a file
